title.rendered: LOYE Multi Purpose Digital Contactless Infrared Medical Forehead Thermometer

content.rendered:
The digital infrared medical Thermometer measures the body temperature based on detecting the infrared energy emitted from the eardrum or the forehead. It Provides fast non-contact forehead temperature measurement, suitable for all ages, including infants and young children. It will read temperature quickly and accurately. This product operates with a LCD display and is equipped with high-fidelity speakers live voice prompts. Users can quickly get measurement results by using our thermometer. For best results Hold 2-3 cm from forehead.

 

product name Infrared Thermometer
Product Model LY-F1
Product Weight  87g (No Included Battery)
Measured Accuracy ±0.2°C
Auto Power off Automatic shutdown within 10s
Measured Time 1s test completed
Durable Years 3 Years
Measured Way Non-Contact Measurement
Measured Distance 3-5cm
Measured Range 32°C-42.9°C
Memory Function 32 Times
Power Supply DC 3.0V Two No.7 AAA batteries
Display Resolution 0.1°C/ °F
Battery Indicator Reminder of battery capacity
 LED three color backlight  1. ?37.49°C: Green backlight

2. 37.5°C<T ?38.1°C: Yellow backlight

3. T> 38.1°C:Red backlight
Dimensions L138*W85*H40
